Title: US1: User Registration and Login
Body:
As a user, I want to create an account so I can save my coffee preferences and order easily.
US2: Save Coffee Preferences,As a user
Labels: I want to save my coffee preferences so I can order quickly without setting them every time.

Title: US3: Coffee Price Comparison
Body:
As a user, I want to compare prices for the same coffee order across different shops nearby.
US4: Place Coffee Order,As a user
Labels: I want to place a coffee order directly from the app with one tap.

Title: US5: Select Payment Method
Body:
As a user, I want to select and save a payment method to complete orders.
US6: View Order History,As a user
Labels: I want to see my past orders for reference.

Title: US7: Simple and Accessible UI
Body: As a user, I want a clean and accessible interface that is easy to use.
